name: The Richest Slime In The World
name_original: The Richest Slime In The World
description:
Instructions:

Move with WASD and place money with left click when you have 10 C or higher. Click the teleport button in the bottom left of the world to pop up a menu where you can teleport to other worlds. Once you have gotten enough coins you can teleport home with the teleport button in the bottom left and click "Return Home". Lastly watch how large your money bin grows!

Note: This prototype is a game that is not meant to take any updates. 

Credits:

Made by Duckigi Games.

Play Testers: Bond Monster Games, Daniel
